original_text: And after that the Levites shall go in to serve at the tent of meeting, when you have cleansed them and offered them as a wave offering.
korean_text: 네가 그들을 정결하게 하여 요제로 드린 후에 그들이 회막에 들어가서 봉사할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: to serve at the tent of meeting
and offered them as a wave offering
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들을 흔들어 드리는 제물로 바쳤을 때
